title: Crypto Watch
description: A responsive web app displaying cryptocurrency data, including price, market capital, trends, and price history, with search functionality.

title: Brain Stack
description: A backend application that manages quiz data with CRUD operations and generates customized quizzes.

title: Stream It
description: A Netflix clone web application that enables users to discover, track, and manage their favorite movies and TV shows.

title: Employee Management System
description: A full-stack web application that allows users to manage employee data through CRUD operations.
